io.craigmiller160.school.repo

Interface GenericEntityDao<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of entity this DAO will persist.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GenericEntityDaoBean<T>, GenericJoinHolderDaoBean<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateCourseDao, HibernateScJoinHolderDao, HibernateStudentDao

    public interface GenericEntityDao<T>
    Generic interface for performing basic CRUD operations and other database interactions. Can be used with ORM frameworks or vanilla JDBC code, depending on the implementation.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    craig

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteEntity(T entity)
      Delete an entity from the database.
      java.util.List<T> getAllEntities()
      Get a list of all entities of this type persisted in the database.
      T getEntityById(int entityId)
      Get an entity from the database by its ID.
      long getEntityCount()
      Get a count of all entities of this type in the database.
      void insertEntity(T entity)
      Insert a new entity into the database.
      void updateEntity(T entity)
      Update an entity already persisted in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • insertEntity

        void insertEntity(T entity)
        Insert a new entity into the database. The entity parameter cannot have the same unique ID as an entity already persisted in the database.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to insert into the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if this operation fails in some way.

      • updateEntity

        void updateEntity(T entity)
        Update an entity already persisted in the database. The entity parameter must have already been inserted previously.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to update in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if this operation fails in some way.

      • deleteEntity

        void deleteEntity(T entity)
        Delete an entity from the database. The entity parameter must have already been persisted previously.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to delete from the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if this operation fails in some way.

      • getEntityById

        T getEntityById(int entityId)
        Get an entity from the database by its ID. If the specified entity does not exist in the database, this operation will fail.
        Parameters:
        entityId - the unique ID of the entity to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the specified entity from the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if this operation fails in some way.

      • getEntityCount

        long getEntityCount()
        Get a count of all entities of this type in the database.
        Returns:
        a count of all entities of this type in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if this operation fails in some way.

      • getAllEntities

        java.util.List<T> getAllEntities()
        Get a list of all entities of this type persisted in the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all entities of this type persisted in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if this operation fails in some way.
